Hi

OpenLayers for R

  • Quick start
    • 1 Install openlayers
    • 2 Attach the namespace
    • 3 Create a new map object
    • 4 Add tiles
    • 5 Add some features
    • 6 Render the map

Quick start

1 Install openlayers

You can install openlayers from github with:

devtools::install_github("crazycapivara/openlayers")

2 Attach the namespace

library(openlayers)
openlayers 0.4.3 wrapping openlayersjs v4.3.1

3 Create a new map object

map <- ol()

4 Add tiles

map <- ol() %>%
  add_stamen_tiles()

5 Add some features

map <- ol() %>%
  add_stamen_tiles() %>%
  add_vector_data(geojsonio::us_cities[1:5, ],
                  style = icon_style())

6 Render the map

map
